ios:release.build: ENVFILE=.env.e2e  xcodebuild -workspace ios/futurelearnmobile.xcworkspace -scheme futurelearnmobile -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

ios:debug.build: ENVFILE=.env.e2e xcodebuild -workspace ios/futurelearnmobile.xcworkspace -scheme futurelearnmobile -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

android:release.build: cd android && ENVFILE=../.env.e2e ./gradlew app:assembleBetaRelease app:assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && cd ..

android:debug.build: cd android && ENVFILE=../.env.e2e ./gradlew app:assembleBetaDebug app:assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..
